name: Moto Traffic Rider 3D Highway
description:
Drive various motorcycles through traffic and different lanscapes. Choose from 8 unique motos, race through traffic and achieve the best score possible. Become a furious moto traffic rider and start racing now.


Features:
- Realistic driving physics
- 8 different motorcycles
- Real cockpits
- Detailed & unique city, snow, desert and offroad lanscapes
